---
name: compiler-options/fingerprint
see also:
---

## Summary

Append content SHA to output file names.  A `manifest.edn` file is emitted to
[doc:compiler-options/output-dir] for mapping to fingerprinted filenames. Defaults to false.

```clj
:fingerprint true
```
